title: How Java Futures, CompletableFutures Improve Asynchronous Service Calls
author: Bob Reselman
description: Calls to distributed services aren't always responded to quickly. Rather than wasting time, learn how to make the external call asynchronously, only to be notified later on when the call completes.
cntitle: Java Futures、CompletableFutures 提升异步服务调用
cndescription: 分布式服务的调用并不总是能得到及时的响应。与其浪费时间，不如学习如何异步地进行外部调用，只在调用完成后才收到通知。
